sourcesContent:
import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Button'; import Alert from 'react-bootstrap/esm/Alert'; import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { useParams, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useSelector } from "react-redux" function SpecialEdit({ neighborhoods, times }) { const specials = useSelector((state) => state.specials); const { id } = useParams() const special = specials.find((special) => special.id === parseInt(id)) const startTime = new Date(special.start_time); const endTime = new Date(special.end_time); const options = { hour: 'numeric', minute: 'numeric', hour12: true, timeZone: 'UTC'}; const startTimeString = startTime.toLocaleTimeString('eng-US', options); const endTimeString = endTime.toLocaleTimeString('eng-US', options) const navigate = useNavigate(); const [errors, setErrors] = useState(null); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ location_name: special.location_name, location_image: special.location_image, location_neighborhood: special.location_neighborhood, location_address: special.location_address, location_url: special.location_url, start_time: s, end_time: "", monday: false, tuesday: false, wednesday: false, thursday: false, friday: false, saturday: false, sunday: false, beer: false, wine: false, cocktails: false, food: false, hh_special_text: "", needs_update_review: true, }) const { location_name, location_image, location_neighborhood, location_address, location_url, start_time, end_time, hh_special_text, monday, tuesday, wednesday, thursday, friday, saturday, sunday, beer, wine, cocktails, food } = formData function handleChange(e) { e.preventDefault() console.log(e) const { name, value } = e.target setFormData({...formData, [name]: value}) console.log(formData) } function handleCheckboxChange(e) { console.log(e) const { name, value } = e.target setFormData({...formData, [name]: value}) console.log(formData) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() fetch("/specials", { method: "PATCH", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify(formData) }) .then(r => { if(r.ok) { r.json().then( navigate("/"), window.alert("Happy Hour Special Added!") ) } else { r.json().then(json => setErrors(json.error)) } }) } return (
Location Name Location Image URL Neighborhood {neighborhoods.map(neighborhood => { return })} Location Address Website Start Time: {times.map(time => { return })} End Time: {times.map(time => { return })} Days of the Week
Types of Specials
Happy Hour Specials {errors ? {errors} : null}
) } export default SpecialEdit
